author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the tofu in an ovenproof dish and then drizzle over the remaining ingredients. Place into the oven to bake for five minutes, or until cooked through. Serve with toasted bread.
ingredients: ½ packet firm tofu, dried and cut into three 1cm/½in slices,  1 lime, zest and juice,  2 tsp honey,  1 garlic clove, sliced,  olive oil, to drizzle,  1 handful peanuts,  toasted bread, to serve
